channel.title: I need help adding a custom!
channel.description: OK so i tried to add a purple and black death cape: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,545625.0.html and i downloaded it and the dat files were not in a winrar folder do i just add them anyways or do i need to make them in a winrar folder? if so how do i do that? plz help!!!

item.title: I need help adding a custom!
item.dc:creator: @000fear000 000fear000
item.description:
@000fear000 wrote:

nvm i figured it out. I had to drag them to gzip.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help adding a custom!

item.title: I need help adding a custom!
item.dc:creator: @Mario_PvP Mario PvP
item.description:
@Mario_PvP wrote:

just add them in the same folder where all the other .dat models are?

Read full topic
